questions: Is there an image of a character whose aura is being graded? Answer with yes or no.
Is the image cropped to the size of a real card? Answer with yes or no.
Does the label at the top have the title 'GNRLYXYZ'? Answer with yes or no.
Is '1/1' displayed directly below 'GNRLYXYZ' on the label? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a barcode placed beneath the '1/1'? Answer with yes or no.
Is the grade label displayed on the right side of the label at the top? Answer with yes or no.
Is the numeric grade from the scale displayed below the grade label? Answer with yes or no.
Is the certification number displayed below the numeric grade? Answer with yes or no.
Is all text on the label uniform in size? Answer with yes or no.
Is there balanced padding from the border for all text on the label? Answer with yes or no.
Is the display placed on a white background? Answer with yes or no.
Is the full display shown without any text or labels on the card? Answer with yes or no.
model_output:
no - The image shows a travel journal map, not a character with an aura being graded.
no - The image is not cropped to the size of a real card; it appears as an illustration or map.
no - The title 'GNRLYXYZ' does not appear at the top; the text 'FIRST STOP: Beijing Travel Journal' is present instead.
no - '1/1' is not displayed below 'GNRLYXYZ'; there is no such title or number in the image.
no - There is no barcode present anywhere in the image.
no - The image does not contain a grading label; it features a travel journal map with various locations.
no - There is no numeric grade displayed below any label; the image is an illustration of a map.
no - There is no certification number displayed; the image contains no grading or certification elements.
no - The text size is not uniform; varying sizes are used for different parts of the illustration.
no - The padding from the border for text is not evenly balanced throughout the illustration.
no - The image is placed on a colored background, primarily yellow, not white.
no - The display includes text and labels such as location names as part of the map illustration.
